sorcer.netlet.util

Class NetletClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • edu.emory.mathcs.util.classloader.URIClassLoader
            • sorcer.netlet.util.NetletClassLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, net.jini.loader.ClassAnnotation

    public class NetletClassLoader
extends URIClassLoader
implements net.jini.loader.ClassAnnotation
    The ServiceClassLoader overrides getURLs(), ensuring all classes that need to be annotated with specific location(s) are returned appropriately

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NetletClassLoader.ClassAnnotator
      Provides support to annotate classes required for dynamic class loading in RMI

    • Field Detail

      • codebase

        protected java.net.URL[] codebase

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetletClassLoader

        public NetletClassLoader(java.net.URI[] searchPath,
                         java.net.URL[] codebase,
                         java.lang.ClassLoader parent,
                         java.util.Properties metaData)
        Constructs a new ServiceClassLoader for the specified URLs having the given parent. The constructor takes two sets of URLs. The first setValue is where the class loader loads classes from, the second setValue is what it returns when getURLs() is called.
        Parameters:
        searchPath - Array of URIs to search for classes
        parent - Parent ClassLoader to delegate to
        metaData - Optional meta data associated with the classloader

    • Method Detail

      • getClassAnnotator

        public net.jini.loader.ClassAnnotation getClassAnnotator()
        Get the NetletClassLoader.ClassAnnotator created at construction time
        Returns:
        The ClassAnnotator

      • getMetaData

        public java.util.Properties getMetaData()
        Get the meta data associated with this classloader
        Returns:
        A Properties object representing any meta data associated with this classloader. A new Properties object is created each time

      • addMetaData

        public void addMetaData(java.util.Properties metaData)
        Add meta data associated with the classloader
        Parameters:
        metaData - Properties to associate to this classloader. If the property already exists in the managed metaData, it will be replaced. New properties will be added. A null parameter will be ignored.

      • getURLs

        public java.net.URL[] getURLs()
        Get the URLs to be used for class annotations as determined by the NetletClassLoader.ClassAnnotator
        Overrides:
        getURLs in class URIClassLoader

      • getSearchPath

        public java.net.URL[] getSearchPath()
                             throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Get the search path of URLs for loading classes and resources
        Returns:
        The array of URL[] which corresponds to the search path for the class loader; that is, the array elements are the locations from which the class loader will load requested classes.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - If any of the URis cannot be transformed to URLs

      • addURLs

        public void addURLs(java.net.URL[] urls)
        Appends the specified URLs to the list of URLs to search for classes and resources.
        Parameters:
        urls - The URLs to add

      • getURIs

        public static java.net.URI[] getURIs(java.net.URL[] urls)
                              throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Convert a URL[] into a URI[]
        Parameters:
        urls - Array of URLs to convert
        Returns:
        Converted array of URIs
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - If there are errors converting the URLs to URIs

      • urisToPath

        protected static java.lang.String urisToPath(java.net.URI[] uris)
        Utility method that converts a URI[] into a corresponding, space-separated string with the same array elements. Note that if the array has zero elements, the return eval is the empty string.
        Parameters:
        uris - An array of URIs that are to be converted
        Returns:
        A space-separated string of each URI provided
